definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: Bonobos have developed a set of ritualized socio-sexual behaviors that are specific to their species.
sentences.chinese: 倭黑猩猩已经形成了一套自己独特的社交性行为。

sentences.english: So, both humans and chimpanzees, for instance, are particularly prone to develop fears of snakes.
sentences.chinese: 例如，人类和黑猩猩，特别容易对蛇产生恐惧感。

sentences.english: And in the other room another chimpanzee is placed.
sentences.chinese: 而在那个房间里有另一只黑猩猩。

sentences.english: Or "suppose that a chimpanzee arrived at a huge fig tree.
sentences.chinese: 又或是假设一个黑猩猩来到一棵很大的无花果树下。

sentences.english: Human beings are prone to catching colds under the changeable weather in early spring, so are chimps.
sentences.chinese: 初春天气忽冷忽热，人容易感冒，黑猩猩也一样。

sentences.english: For the sake of chimpanzee survival throughout Africa, those questions urgently need to be studied.
sentences.chinese: 为了保证所有非洲黑猩猩的生存，这些问题亟待解决。

sentences.english: "I hope bonobos win... it will be better for everyone," he added.
sentences.chinese: 我希望倭黑猩猩的一面多一点，这样对大家更好些。

sentences.english: Humans and chimps, it turns out, value age in sexual partners very differently.
sentences.chinese: 原来，人类和黑猩猩对性伙伴年龄的选择极其不同。

sentences.english: What's your position on people who have chimps as pets? Siobhan Laurino, LYNN, MASS.
sentences.chinese: 你怎么看那些把黑猩猩当宠物养的人？

sentences.english: But then again, we’re hardly as sexually carefree as bonobos.
sentences.chinese: 但是另一方面，我们很难像倭黑猩猩那样的“开放”。

sentences.english: But the fate of Gusta, Lilly, Karel, Pedro and Soko has sparked outrage in the local media.
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩们的遭遇在当地媒体激起了公愤。

sentences.english: She named the old chimp David Greybeard.
sentences.chinese: 她给这只老黑猩猩起名叫灰胡子大卫。

sentences.english: The Kenyanthropus fossil has a small earhole , like those of chimpanzees.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚平脸人像黑猩猩般有一个细小的耳孔。

sentences.english: The most aggressive apes of all were the bonobos.
sentences.chinese: 所有的猿类中最具攻击性的是倭黑猩猩。

sentences.english: The most aggressive apes of all were the bonobos .
sentences.chinese: 所有的猿类中最具攻击性的是倭黑猩猩。

sentences.english: He notes that chimpanzees have tool cultures.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，黑猩猩具有工具的文化。

definition: rhesus macaque (Macaca mulatta)/rhesus monkey/lit. river Ganges monkey of north India
